sentences.en: Ask relative department in charge to mediate.
sentences.cn: 要求有关主管部门调解.

sentences.en: Could they mediate a decade of emptiness between him and her?
sentences.cn: 可书能填补他们父女之间的空白 吗 ?

sentences.en: DON'T try to mediate a bullying situation.
sentences.cn: 当 你 知道一件欺凌事件发生后,不要试图从中调停解决.

sentences.en: He attempted to mediate their differences.
sentences.cn: 他试图调停他们的分歧.

sentences.en: He tried to mediate between his colleagues and management.
sentences.cn: 他设法在同事和管理阶层之间斡旋.

sentences.en: Meaning mediate a dispute and appease conflict.
Sad and alone when how to mediate the mood?
sentences.cn: 伤心孤单的时候怎样调解心情?

sentences.en: The former president has agreed to mediate the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 前总统同意就和谈进行斡旋。

sentences.en: The Secretary-General was asked to mediate in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 有人请秘书长来调解这次纷争。

sentences.en: The techniques employed in the construction of his work mediate this experience.
sentences.cn: 他创作中所采用的技巧会让观众产生这方面的经验.

sentences.en: Theory must mediate between all previous truths and certain new experiences.
sentences.cn: 理论必须在所有以前的真理与一些确定的新的经验之间过渡调停.

sentences.en: There were some mediate contacts between the two countries before their diplomatic relation was established.
sentences.cn: 在两国外交关系建立之前,已经有些间接的接触.

sentences.en: This is group of mediate of Sichuan oil ground appoint deep - experience.
sentences.cn: 这是四川石油地调处团委的深切感受.

sentences.en: To act as an intermediary; mediate.
sentences.cn: 调解充当调解人; 调解.

sentences.en: Two talks are to cooperate to perhaps negotiate, tripartite talk is mediate.
sentences.cn: 两方会谈是合作或者谈判, 三方会谈则是斡旋.

sentences.en: When wanting to angry very much, how does control mediate his mood?
sentences.cn: 很想发火的时候, 怎么控制调解自己的情绪?

trans.tran_en: to try to end a quarrel between two people, groups, countries etc
